pr_title: [GEOS-9680] WMTS othersSrs always add EPSG:4326 and shows wrong CRS code

timeline.message: [GEOS-9680] WMTS othersSrs always add EPSG:4326 and shows wrong CRS code

timeline.bodyText: What happens when these fixed SRS names are used for cascading? Wondering if it might lead to an axis flip issue.
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: thanks for your point @aaime . Fixed this by leaving the urn format for CRS.
replies.author: taba90

timeline.author: aaime
